title: Cafe Morgenrot
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, German
description: This Berlin vegetarian cafe evokes an atmosphere of a meeting place for young political activists and punks, and kinda like a beer house. About 80-90% vegan. Some items are pay-what-you-can within a given range between 5 and 9 Euros. Between Thursday and Thursday they sell a daily vegan soup, vegetarian quiche, and different sweets (like vegan snickers and vegan cakes). Friday til Sunday a vegan-vegetarian buffet. Also sells cakes on the weekend.
